title: A2
text: As a civic analysis student at the University of Illinois Chicago, I have solid data analysis skills and am proficient in using R language and other tools. I have extensive experience in courses and projects and am able to process and analyze various types of data. I hope to contribute to solving real-world problems through my professional knowledge and skills and continue to improve my capabilities in the field of data analysis.

title: resume
text: Yufei Wang Contact Information Email: ywang654@uic.edu Phone: 312-978-4304 Education MSCA University of illinois Chicago GPA: 3.5/4.0 Work Experience Teaching Assistant at New Oriental Company (2019 - 2023) Assisted in preparing and delivering engaging lesson plans for various subjects, ensuring a stimulating learning environment for students. Provided individualized support to students, addressing their specific needs and helping them achieve their academic goals. Collaborated with lead teachers to evaluate students’ progress and implement effective teaching strategies. Utilized multimedia tools and educational software to enhance the learning experience and keep students engaged.
